item.title: CVE-2024-33629|2024-04-29T07:43:40.108Z -- Creative Motion -- Auto Featured Image (Auto Post Thumbnail)
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Creative Motion Auto Featured Image (Auto Post Thumbnail).This issue affects Auto Featured Image (Auto Post Thumbnail): from n/a through 4.0.0.
